info.description: The REST Application Programming Interface (API) for File Master Plus, file management and data manipulation tool.
info.title: File Master Plus

tags.name: MVSdataSets
tags.description: File operations on z/OS data sets

get.summary: Checks that a File Master Plus instance is present.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Basic Auth (with mainframe username and password)

200.description: ok, Pong File Master Plus instance found

404.description: File Master Plus instance Not Found

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Basic Auth (with mainframe username and password)

parameters.name: renameToDataSet
parameters.description: New name of the data set. Example - FMMVS.DEMO.NEW.CUSTFILE

put.summary: Copies data from one data set to another, and optionally filters the copied data using selection criteria.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Basic Auth (with mainframe username and password)

parameters.name: copyToDataSet
parameters.description: Identifies the target data set name. Example - FMMVS.DEMO.COPY.CUSTFILE

put.summary: Populates a data set with records according to the layout in a COBOL or PL/I copybook.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Basic Auth (with mainframe username and password)

parameters.name: populateToDataSet
parameters.description: Identifies the target data set name. Example - FMMVS.DEMO.POP.CUSTFILE

post.summary: Creates a physical sequential, large format sequential, partitioned or extended partitioned data set.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Basic Auth (with mainframe username and password)

parameters.name: createMVSDataSetName
parameters.description: Identifies the data set name. Example - FMMVS.DEMO.MVS.CUSTFILE

post.summary: Creates a VSAM data set: KSDS, ESDS, RRDS, VRRDS, LDS.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Basic Auth (with mainframe username and password)

parameters.name: createVSAMDataSetName
parameters.description: Identifies the data set name. Example - FMMVS.DEMO.VSAM.CUSTFILE

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Basic Auth (with mainframe username and password)

parameters.name: dataSetName
parameters.description: Identifies the data set name to delete. Example - FMMVS.DEMO.DEL.CUSTFILE

messageContent: THE CLUSTER NAMED 'FMMVS.DEMO.DEL.CUSTFILE' HAS BEEN DELETED

fileFormat.description: Identifies the type of file to create.

model.description: (Optional) Specifies the name of a model data set. All attributes from the model data set are copied except the attributes that you specify.

lrecl.description: Specifies the length of the logical record.Values: 1-32760

blksize.description: (Optional) Specifies the size of the block of records.Values: 1-32760

primary.description: Specifies the primary space allocation unit.Values: 0-16777215

secondary.description: Specifies the secondary space allocation unit.Values: 0-16777215

directory.description: (PDS only) Specifies the number of directory blocks.Values: 0-16777215

volume.description: (Optional) An array that specifies one or more disk volumes or specific tapes.

dsVersion.description: (PDSE only) Specifies the PDSE version number.

pdseGen.description: (PDSE v2 only) Specifies the number of generations.

date.description: Specifies the expiration date, in YYYY-MM-DD format.

permanent.description: Specifies that the data set is permanent and does not expire.

messageContent: THE SEQUENTIAL FILE NAMED 'FMMVS.DEMO.MVS.CUSTFILE' HAS BEEN ALLOCATED

fileFormat.description: Identifies the type of file to create.

model.description: (Optional) Specifies the name of a model data set. All attributes from the model data set are copied except the attributes that you specify.

organization.description: Specifies the data set type. K - KSDS, E - ESDS, L - LDS, R - RRDS

bufferSpace.description: (Optional) Specifies the minimum buffer space to be allocated when this VSAM file is accessed.

erase.description: (Optional) Specify 'Y' to allocate the ERASE parameter, which overwrites all components of the file with binary zeros when the VSAM file is deleted from the catalog.

loadRestartable.description: (Optional) Specify 'Y' to allocate the RECOVERY parameter, which pre-formats the data component prior to the initial load. Specify �N� to allocate the SPEED parameter, which disables pre-formatting of the data component prior to the initial load.

reuse.description: (Optional) Specify 'Y' to allocate the REUSE parameter, which specifies that the cluster can be opened repeatedly as a reusable cluster.

spanned.description: (Optional, KSDS and ESDS only) Specify 'Y' to allocate the SPANNED parameter, which allows data records larger than a control interval to span multiple control intervals.

writecheck.description: (Optional) Specify 'Y' to allocate the WRITECHECK parameter, which validates each write to the VSAM file with a read-without-data transfer.

capercent.description: Specifies the percentage of control intervals to be left unused in each control area as the file is initially loaded. The use of control area free space lets some control interval splits occur before requiring a control area split. Values: 1-100

cipercent.description: Specifies the percentage of empty space to be left in each control interval when the file is initially loaded. The free space lets records be inserted or expanded within a control interval before requiring a control interval split. Values: 1-100

length.description: Specifies the length of the key within the base cluster.

offset.description: Specifies the position of the key within the base cluster.

recordsize.description: Specifies data record size parameters (not applicable for LDS).

average.description: Specifies the average data record length.

maximum.description: Specifies the maximum data record length.

crossRegion.description: Identifies how the file can be shared among regions within the same system or within multiple systems using GRS (Global Resource Serialization)

crossSystem.description: Specifies how the file can be shared among systems

date.description: Specifies the expiration date, in YYYY-MM-DD format.

permanent.description: Specifies that the data set is permanent and does not expire.

rlsEnable.description: (Optional) Specify 'N' to disable VSAM record-level sharing. The default value is 'Y'.

log.description: (Optional) Specifies whether the sphere to be accessed with VSAM RLS is recoverable or non-recoverable and whether or not to perform forward recovery logging for this VSAM data set. The default value is NONE.

frlog.description: (Optional) Specifies the type of VSAM batch logging to perform for this VSAM data set.

logReplicate.description: (Optional) Specify 'Y' to enable VSAM replication for this data set

logStreamId.description: Specifies the 1- to 26-character name of the forward recovery log stream.

controlIntervalSize.description: Specifies the size of the Control Interval for the data VSAM component. This parameter is mandatory for a KSDS, RRDS or VRRDS.Values: 0-16777215

dsname.description: (Optional) Specifies the data set name of the data VSAM component. If you do not specify a value, the data set name is set to the cluster name with '.DATA' appended.

volume.description: (Optional) An array that specifies one or more disk volumes or specific tapes.

primary.description: Specifies the primary space allocation unit.Values: 0-16777215

secondary.description: Specifies the secondary space allocation unit.Values: 0-16777215

controlIntervalSize.description: Specifies the size of the Control Interval for the index VSAM component. This parameter is mandatory for a KSDS, RRDS or VRRDS.Values: 0-16777215

dsname.description: (Optional) Specifies the data set name of the index VSAM component. If you do not specify a value, the data set name is set to the cluster name with '.INDEX' appended.

volume.description: (Optional) An array that specifies one or more disk volumes or specific tapes.

primary.description: Specifies the primary space allocation unit.Values: 0-16777215

secondary.description: Specifies the secondary space allocation unit.Values: 0-16777215

messageContent: THE 'VSAM' FILE 'FMMVS.DEMO.VSAM.CUSTFILE' HAS BEEN ALLOCATED SUCCESSFULLY

member.description: (Optional) Identifies the member of the target data set to populate in PDS

layout.description: (Optional) Identifies the layout PDS with member name. Used only if dynamic selection criteria refer to layout fields.

items.description: layout data set and member name

data.description: Identifies the data of the corresponding field to populate in JSON format.

from.description: Defines the data set name of the source file

members.description: (Optional) Identifies the members to copy. This parameter is only used if the source data set is a PDS; by default, all members are copied

replace.description: (Optional) Replaces resource-specific items in the target data set. This parameter is only used if the target data set is a PDS or a VSAM KSDS. Default value: Y

pdseGenValue.description: (Optional) Specifies the PDSE V2 generation number of the data set that you want to copy. This parameter should only be specified if the from data set is a PDSE V2. If this parameter is not specified and the from data set is a PDSE V2 then the current level is copied. A negative number specifies a relative generation, a positive number specifies an absolute generation, * specifies all generations and 0 specifies the current level. Values: '-2000000000 to 2000000000', '*'.

staticSelectionCriteria.description: (Optional) Identifies the member name of the selection criteria. Only a member name that exists in <PARMPRE>.SELECT PDS can be specified. PARMPRE is a parameter in the File Master CLIST. The File Master CLIST is identified in the Tomcat configuration by the sysproc and FMM_CLIST parameters

layout.description: (Optional) Identifies the layout PDS with member name. Used only if dynamic selection criteria refer to layout fields.

items.description: layout data set and member name

messageContent: DDNAME SYSUT1 opened for DSN=FMMVS.DEMO.BASE.CUSTFILE File is VSAM Type=KSDS, KeyLen=7,KeyPos=2
DDNAME SYSUT1O opened for DSN=FMMVS.DEMO.COPY.CUSTFILE,File is VSAM Type=KSDS,Mode=Replace,KeyLen=7,KeyPos=2

from.description: Defines the data set name of the source file which you want to rename

RenameVSAMComponents.description: (Optional) If Y is specified, the data and index components of the target VSAM cluster which share the same cluster name are renamed. The default value is N

example.messageContent: THE VSAM COMPONENT 'FMMVS.DEMO.BASE.CUSTFILE' HAS BEEN SUCCESSFULLY RENAMED TO  'FMMVS.DEMO.NEW.CUSTFILE'

serviceId.description: unique session ID for each File Master Plus instance
